blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
James: Hey Ev...
Lily: (without looking up) The Giant Squid.
James: ...what?
Lily: That’s who I would rather go to Hogsmeade...
body:
James: Hey Ev...
Lily: (without looking up) The Giant Squid.
James: ...what?
Lily: That’s who I would rather go to Hogsmeade with.
Lily: (finally looks up) Did that answer your question or do I still have to suffer through a conversation with you?

dialogue.name: Lily
dialogue.label: Lily:
dialogue.phrase: That’s who I would rather go to Hogsmeade with.

dialogue.label: Lily:

question: charlie weasley
answer:
otp: none (I follow the headcanon that he’s aroace)

brotp: charlie and hagrid (because a) dragons b) the transition from teacher and student to friends is a really interesting shift in like… the relationship in general? because power dynamics and administration and a lot of other things,, i love exploring the idea tbh)

notp: anything that implies he’s fucking a dragon

thing i like most about him: dragons? dragons???

thing i dislike most about him: quidditch player charlie weasley has never been seen rising a dragon in the whole series and that is a Loss

summary: Remember how full house had a mostly white cast and how fuller house has one  poc in it? Remember how The loud house has one...
body: Remember how full house had a mostly white cast and how fuller house has one poc in it? Remember how The loud house has one lgbt character in it and 2 pocs in it? Remember how Hollywood is racist as fuck and “Can’t find an actor to play Aladdin”? Maybe we can make a difference by, instead of trying to change a loved author who has depression and is trying to do what you WANT we can complain about more modern stuff, like Fuller house and cartoons being only white or 99% white. You can’t change a series that’s been out for years, what you can do is change the future and what’s happening now.

blog.name: the-headmistress
blog.title: Have a biscuit, Potter.
blog.description:
Before we start the festivities I have a few announcements for our new students: | |
1. This is a fic rec blog for drarry fics, not only for big writers but especially for new ones. | |
So if you're new to the fandom, or simply unrecognised, and need a place to get started, feel free to send me a link to your fic and I'll read it and rec it for you! | |
2. Support and love for new writers is more than welcome! If you don't like what you read, click back—that's why we have the button—and start another one. | |
3. Ship and let ship. Your kink isn't my kink and that's okay. | |
4. Stay out of the forbidden forest, every student who comes out of it alive will be sent straight back home! No exceptions! | |
(If there are too many fics sent our way it's possible we won't find the time to read them all. We are humans with a family, job and life outside the fandom so please keep that in mind.)||
Art by @llap115
http://llap115.tumblr.com

title: Flying Fic Rec
body:
Title: Castle on the Hill

Word count: 1,649
Author: tsundanire | @breathofmine
Rating: Not Rated
Warnings: ALL THE FLUFF
Summary: Based on Ed Sheeran’s “Castle on the Hill” Harry takes a “road trip” back to England after spending a few years in Romania working with dragons.
–
The scenery in this fic is gorgeous, and the story arc is even more beautiful.  Hop on your broom, we’ve got some in-flight entertainment for you!
Read it on A03

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: His Shield Charm was so strong Snape was knocked off-balance and hit a desk. The whole class had looked around and now watched...
caption:
His Shield Charm was so strong Snape was knocked off-balance and hit a desk. The whole class had looked around and now watched as Snape righted himself, scowling.
“Do you remember me telling you we are practicing nonverbal spells, Potter?”
“Yes,” said Harry stiffly.
“Yes, sir.”
“There’s no need to call me ‘sir,’ Professor.” The words had escaped him before he knew what he was saying. Several people gasped, including Hermione. Behind Snape, however, Ron, Dean, and Seamus grinned appreciatively.

Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
© J.K. Rowling

1-0, Harry.
